name: Old Fashioned
instruction: Place sugar cube in old fashioned glass and saturate with bitters, add a dash of plain water.
Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whiskey.
Garnish with orange twist, and a cocktail cherry.

name: Long Island Tea
instruction: Combine all ingredients (except cola) and pour over ice in a highball glass.
Add the splash of cola for color.
Decorate with a slice of lemon and serve.

name: Negroni
instruction: Stir into glass over ice, garnish and serve.
